0.text: Innate: Sylas'  ability casts generate a stack of Unshackled lasting 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 3 times. While Sylas has stacks, he gains  125% bonus attack speed.
0.html: Innate: Sylas' ability casts generate a stack of Unshackled lasting 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 3 times. While Sylas has stacks, he gains  125% bonus attack speed.
markedPassages: 125% bonus attack speed
125% bonus attack speed

1.text: Innate - Unshackled: Sylas' next basic attack consumes a stack to whirl his chains around him, which has an  uncancellable windup and deals 130% AD (+ 25% AP) magic damage to the primary target and 40% AD (+ 20% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
1.html: Innate - Unshackled: Sylas' next basic attack consumes a stack to whirl his chains around him, which has an uncancellable windup and deals 130% AD (+ 25% AP) magic damage to the primary target and 40% AD (+ 20% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup

2.text: Damage to secondary targets executes  minions that would be left below  25 health.
2.html: Damage to secondary targets executes minions that would be left below  25 health.
markedPassages: minions
25 health

3.text: The empowered attack applies on-hit effects to the primary target but disables  critical strike bonus damage. Spell effects only apply to secondary targets.
3.html: The empowered attack applies on-hit effects to the primary target but disables critical strike bonus damage. Spell effects only apply to secondary targets.
markedPassages: critical strike

0.text: Active: Sylas lashes out two chains that converge to the target location and extend beyond it up to a maximum range, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  slowing them for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Sylas lashes out two chains that converge to the target location and extend beyond it up to a maximum range, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and slowing them for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

1.text: After a 0.6-second delay, the chains' intersection explodes to deal magic damage to enemies within, reduced by 60% against  minions and  monsters.
1.html: After a 0.6-second delay, the chains' intersection explodes to deal magic damage to enemies within, reduced by 60% against minions and monsters.
markedPassages: minions
monsters

2.text: Chain Lash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Chain Lash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Sylas  dashes to the front of the target enemy's location and strikes them to deal magic damage.
0.html: Active: Sylas dashes to the front of the target enemy's location and strikes them to deal magic damage.
markedPassages: dashes

1.text: If this damages a  champion, Sylas is also  healed, increased by 0% − 100% (based on Sylas' missing health).
1.html: If this damages a champion, Sylas is also healed, increased by 0% − 100% (based on Sylas' missing health).
markedPassages: champion
healed
0% − 100% (based on Sylas' missing health)

0.text: Active: Sylas  dashes to the target location. Within 3.5 seconds, he can cast  Abduct after a 0.2-second delay from casting Abscond.
0.html: Active: Sylas dashes to the target location. Within 3.5 seconds, he can cast Abduct after a 0.2-second delay from casting Abscond.
markedPassages: dashes
Abduct

1.text: Kingslayer can be cast during the dash. Abscond will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
1.html: Kingslayer can be cast during the dash. Abscond will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: Kingslayer

0.text: Active: Sylas whips out his chains in the target direction that deal magic damage to the first enemy hit,  revealing and  stunning them for 0.5 seconds. He will then  dash towards their location and  knock them up for 0.5 seconds upon arrival.
0.html: Active: Sylas whips out his chains in the target direction that deal magic damage to the first enemy hit, revealing and stunning them for 0.5 seconds. He will then dash towards their location and knock them up for 0.5 seconds upon arrival.
markedPassages: revealing
stunning
dash
knock them up

1.text: Sylas is  unable to cast  Chain Lash while the chains are in flight.
1.html: Sylas is unable to cast Chain Lash while the chains are in flight.
markedPassages: unable
Chain Lash

5.text: ON-TARGET COOLDOWN: 200% OF TARGET'S ULTIMATE COOLDOWN

0.text: Active: Sylas launches his chains at the target enemy champion, gaining a copy of their ultimate ability upon arrival and  revealing them for 0.825 seconds at the start of the cast time. Sylas cannot select the same champion again for a set duration, and can hold the hijacked ultimate for 90 seconds, during which he can recast Hijack.
0.html: Active: Sylas launches his chains at the target enemy champion, gaining a copy of their ultimate ability upon arrival and revealing them for 0.825 seconds at the start of the cast time. Sylas cannot select the same champion again for a set duration, and can hold the hijacked ultimate for 90 seconds, during which he can recast Hijack.
markedPassages: revealing

1.text: Recast: Sylas casts his hijacked ultimate ability at no cost, scaling based on Hijack's rank and his own statistics.
1.html: Recast: Sylas casts his hijacked ultimate ability at no cost, scaling based on Hijack's rank and his own statistics.

2.text: Hijacked ultimates and abilities that do not scale with  ability power have their  attack damage ratios converted to ability power ratios, scaling with 0.6% AP per 1% total AD, and 0.4% AP per 1% bonus AD respectively.
2.html: Hijacked ultimates and abilities that do not scale with  ability power have their  attack damage ratios converted to ability power ratios, scaling with 0.6% AP per 1% total AD, and 0.4% AP per 1% bonus AD respectively.
markedPassages: ability power
ability power
attack damage
attack damage

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you cannot gain mana, heal for 「 45% of this value 」「 0.675 」instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Glaciate: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to enemies struck within and slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies hit in the center of the cone are rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – GLACIATE: Unleash a fan of icy shards in a cone in the target direction, dealing 100 (+ 30% AP) magic damage to enemies struck within and  slowing them by 65% for 1 second. Enemies hit in the center of the cone are  rooted for the same duration instead (30 second cooldown).
